data.title: I have never had a bad time!
data.text: Keggers has been my go to place for the past five years.  The main reason being, they bring in a wide variety of live music.  I live two hours away and have made the trip down to watch some shows and have never been disappointed.  Keggers has all the standards, drink specials, jukebox, sports T.V., free popcorn, dance floor area. But what Keggers also has is great bar service, a private outdoor smoking area, and one of the best stage/sound system set ups that a "bar" can offer.

data.title: Great stop during farmers market
data.text: This was a great stop during the farmers market. Good priced beer and a nice spread of food for free, and in the middle of the market. Can't go wrong!!

data.title: Nice Place
data.text: Fun place - nice outdoor beer garden in back.  The service is good. I'm not sure if they offer food, but certainly if you'll looking for a place to hang out and have a few, try Keggers.

data.title: relaxing time
data.text: My wife and I stopped at Keggers after an afternoon at the Farmer's Market on Broadway Street. Service was good. They had a musical group in the back area, which was open.Relaxed atmosphere.

data.title: Deafening Karaoke
data.text:
We stopped in on a Thursday night solely because an acquaintance recommended Keggers for good karaoke.  We thought it might be a nice little pub because it's located in the heart of the renovated section of Broadway.  

Keggers serves no food, except Hydrant frozen pizza.  They also serve no wine, except one "red" and one "white".  Neither variety is potable.  If you like beer or hard liquor, you're in luck.  Drinks average less than $4 each.

The pub consists of a large round bar that takes up most of the room, and two high tables at the front window.  You can't get table service - you have to go up to the bar to order your beverage.  

The karaoke is awful.  Beginning at 9:30, the DJ cranks the volume so high that you literally must yell at the person sitting next to you, to have a conversation.  As a participant, you can't hear yourself sing.  Asking Mr. DJ  to please turn it down a notch is futile.

We had one drink and left because we were becoming deaf in less than half an hour.

data.title: average
data.text: music on weekend and Wed. during summer 2 fors 3-7 typical workin  class bar till 7 21 to 30s night time
